channel.title: Contributor Agreements on OPRAmachine Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Contributor Agreements on OPRAmachine Documentation

item.title: Agreement for Individuals
item.description: Thank you for your interest in contributing to OPRAmachine (“We” or “Us”). This contributor agreement (“Agreement”) documents the rights granted by contributors to Us. To make this document effective, please sign it and send it to Us by email or electronic submission, following the instructions at . This is a legally binding document, so please read it carefully before agreeing to it. The Agreement may cover more than one software project managed by Us.

item.title: Agreement for Organizations

To make this document effective, please sign it and send it to Us by email or electronic submission, following the instructions at .
